TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Morris_Almond, title = Morris_Almond, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Morris_Almond} }

S.FORM: Morris Almond sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1985, ryax sa tay 2 nqu tay 2, Morris Almond, squliq na p'unro.
